answers.answer: Hello!Overwork, stress and depression can all be the possible causes of your weight loss. Medical conditions like diabetes mellitus, hyperthroidism, peptic ulcers, tuberculosis, celiac disease, Crohn’s disease, ulcerative colitis, HIV/AIDS etc.can also lead to unexplained weight loss. These above mentioned causes are commonly associated with the symptom of weight loss. But at the same time there will be other associated symptoms. Try to avoid stress and stay away from depression. Seek the opinion of local health care provider. I hope it helps.Good luck!

question: In the past year I have lost 15 lbs. I have had 2 different sexual partners one in which I have been in a long term relationship with now. Got tested after four months of last exposure. I do manual labor for a living. What could be the cause of my weightloss? My relationship is stressful.
title: weightloss
